            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $this->PageComposer === false )
                        {
                              $this->PageComposer = get_package( 'page::page_composer' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        }
                        
                        $Path = $this->PageComposer->Template->process_string( $Path );
                        
                        foreach( $this->IncludedScripts as $k => $v )
                        {
                              if( $v[ 'path' ] == $Path )
                              {
                                    return;
                              }
                        }
                        
                        $this->IncludedScripts [] = array( 'path' => $Path , 'join' => $Join );
                  }

$  String,
&$  Changed,
$  Type 
)

Function calls processor.

Parameters:
$p - Fetched object.
$String - String to process.
$Changed - Was the string processed.
$Type - Processor's type.
Returns:
Processed string.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 998 of file page_composer_utilities.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $RealType = $this->get_function_name( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , $Type );
                        
                        if( $RealType === false && $Type == 'process_string' )
                        {
                              /* nop */
                        }
                        elseif( $RealType === false  )
                        {
                              $this->throw_method_was_not_found_exception( $p , $Type );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              $Caller = array( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , $RealType );
                              $CallParameters = array( $p[ 'settings' ] , $String , &$Changed );
                              $String = call_user_func_array( $Caller , $CallParameters );
                        }
                        
                        return( $String );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

execute_generators ( &$  Packages,
$  Type,
&$  Template 
)

Function runs generators.

Parameters:
$Packages - Packages.
$Type - Generator type.
$Template - Template.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 1053 of file page_composer_utilities.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->Trace->start_group( $Type );
                        $Changed = false;
                        foreach( $Packages as $i => $p )
                        {
                              if( $p[ 'settings' ]->get_setting( $Type , false ) )
                              {
                                    if( method_exists( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , $Type ) )
                                    {
                                          $Caller = array( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , $Type );
                                          $Settings = $p[ 'settings' ];
                                          call_user_func( $Caller , $Settings );
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $this->throw_method_was_not_found_exception( $p , $Type );
                                    }
                              }
                        }
                        $Template->add_stylesheets();
                        
                        $this->Trace->end_group();
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

execute_processors ( &$  Packages,
$  String,
$  Type 
)

Function runs postprocessing.

Parameters:
$Packages - Packages.
$String - String to process.
$Type - Processor type.
Returns:
Processed string.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 1115 of file page_composer_utilities.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->Trace->start_group( "$Type" );

                        do
                        {
                              $Changed = false;

                              foreach( $Packages as $i => $p )
                              {
                                    if( $Type == 'process_string' || $p[ 'settings' ]->get_setting( $Type , false ) )
                                    {
                                          $String = $this->call_processor_function( $p , $String , $Changed , $Type );
                                    }
                              }
                        }
                        while( $Changed );

                        $this->Trace->end_group();

                        return( $String );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Definition at line 923 of file page_composer_utilities.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        foreach( $Packages as $i => $p )
                        {
                              $this->load_settings_for_package( $Packages[ $i ] , $Template );
                              
                              if( $Packages[ $i ][ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'meta' , false ) !== false )
                              {
                                    $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( $p[ 'package' ] , $p[ 'package_version' ] );
                                    $MetaFileName = $Packages[ $i ][ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'meta' );
                                    $MetaSettings = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$PackagePath/meta/$MetaFileName" );
                                    $Packages[ $i ][ 'settings' ]->append_settings( $MetaSettings );
                              }
                              if( $Packages[ $i ][ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'controller' , false ) == '1' )
                              {
                                    $Packages[ $i ][ 'fetched_package' ] = $this->get_controller( 
                                          $p[ 'package' ] , $p[ 'package_version' ]
                                    );
                              }
                              elseif( $Packages[ $i ][ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'view' , false ) == '1' )
                              {
                                    $Packages[ $i ][ 'fetched_package' ] = $this->get_view( 
                                          $p[ 'package' ] , $p[ 'package_version' ]
                                    );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Packages[ $i ][ 'fetched_package' ] = get_package(
                                          $p[ 'package' ] , $p[ 'package_version' ] , __FILE__
                                    );
                              }
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( $RequestionFunction == 'post_process' || $RequestionFunction == 'pre_process' )
                        {
                              if( method_exists( $PackageObject , $RequestionFunction ) )
                              {
                                    return( $RequestionFunction );
                              }
                        }

)

Function returns list of packages.

$PageName - Name of the composing page.
$PageOptions - Generation options.
Returns:
HTML code of the composed page.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 819 of file page_composer_utilities.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $Settings->load_settings( $PageOptions );
                        $PredefinedPackages = array();
                        if( $Settings->get_setting( 'predefined_packages' , false ) )
                        {
                              $PredefinedPackagesRaw = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( 
                                    dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_predefined_packages' , 'exploded'
                              );
                              foreach( $PredefinedPackagesRaw as $Value )
                              {
                                    $Tmp = explode( '#' , $Value );
                                    $PredefinedPackages [] = array( 
                                          'package' => $Tmp[ 0 ] , 'package_version' => $Tmp[ 1 ] , 
                                          'options' => $Tmp[ 2 ] , 'placeholder' => $Tmp[ 3 ]
                                    );
                              }
                        }
                        
                        $PagePackages = $Page->get_package_appliance( $PageName );
                        
                        return( array_merge( $PredefinedPackages , $PagePackages ) );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

join_scripts ( $  Files  ) 

Function unites scripts.

Parameters:
$Files - Array of files to unite.
Returns:
Array of files after the union.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Calculated hash of the set of files.

Definition at line 359 of file page_composer_utilities.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( is_array( $Files ) && count( $Files ) > 0 )
                        {
                              $FilesHash = '';
                              foreach( $Files as $k => $v )
                              {
                                    if( $v[ 'join' ] )
                                    {
                                          $FilesHash .= $v[ 'path' ];
                                    }
                              }
                              $FilesHash = md5( $FilesHash );
                              
                              $UnionFilePath = dirname( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.js";
                              
                              $FilesRet = array();
                              
                              if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $UnionFilePath ) === false || 
                                    $this->Cache->get_data( $UnionFilePath ) === false )
                              {
                                    $Handle = fopen( $UnionFilePath , "wb" );
                                    
                                    foreach( $Files as $k => $v )
                                    {
                                          if( $v[ 'join' ] )
                                          {
                                                if( strpos( $v[ 'path' ] , '{http_host}/' ) === 0 )
                                                {
                                                      $v[ 'path' ] = str_replace( '{http_host}/' , './' , $v[ 'path' ] );
                                                }
                                                $v[ 'path' ] = $this->String->compile_ultimix_tags( $v[ 'path' ] );
                                                
                                                $Content = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( $v[ 'path' ] );
                                                fwrite( $Handle , $Content );
                                                fwrite( $Handle , "\r\n" );
                                          }
                                          else
                                          {
                                                $FilesRet [] = array( 'path' => $v[ 'path' ] );
                                          }
                                    }
                                    
                                    fclose( $Handle );
                                    
                                    $FilesRet [] = array( 
                                          'path' => str_replace( 
                                                './' , '{http_host}/' , _get_package_relative_path( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.js"
                                          )
                                    );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    foreach( $Files as $k => $v )
                                    {
                                          if( !$v[ 'join' ] )
                                          {
                                                $FilesRet [] = array( 'path' => $v[ 'path' ] );
                                          }
                                    }
                                    $FilesRet [] = array( 
                                          'path' => str_replace( 
                                                './' , '{http_host}/' , _get_package_relative_path( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.js"
                                          )
                                    );
                              }

                              return( $FilesRet );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              return( $Files );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

join_stylesheets ( $  Files  ) 

Function unites stylesheets.

Parameters:
$Files - Array of files to unite.
Returns:
Array of files after the union.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

here we sort stylesheets by the the folders in wich they are placed

processing sorted files

first variant of the joining when there is no relative paths in the stylesheets

second variant when there is nothing to join

third variant - join files within the single package

Definition at line 204 of file page_composer_utilities.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( is_array( $Files ) && count( $Files ) > 0 )
                        {
                              $RetFiles = array();
                              
                              $Compressed = array();
                              
                              foreach( $Files as $k => $v )
                              {
                                    if( strpos( $v[ 'path' ] , '{http_host}/' ) === 0 )
                                    {
                                          $v[ 'path' ] = str_replace( '{http_host}/' , './' , $v[ 'path' ] );
                                    }
                                    $v[ 'path' ] = $this->String->compile_ultimix_tags( $v[ 'path' ] );
                                          
                                    if( $v[ 'join' ] )
                                    {
                                          $Compressed[ 'join' ] [] = $v[ 'path' ];
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $Key = dirname( $v[ 'path' ] );
                                          $Key = str_replace( '././' , './' , $Key );
                                          
                                          if( isset( $Compressed[ $Key ] ) == false )
                                          {
                                                $Compressed[ $Key ] = array();
                                          }
                                          
                                          $Compressed[ $Key ] [] = basename( $v[ 'path' ] );
                                    }
                              }
                              
                              foreach( $Compressed as $k1 => $v1 )
                              {
                                    if( $k1 === 'join' )
                                    {
                                          $FilesHash = '';
                                          foreach( $v1 as $k2 => $v2 )
                                          {
                                                $FilesHash .= $v2;
                                          }
                                          
                                          $FilesHash = md5( $FilesHash );
                                          $UnionFilePath = dirname( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.css";
                                          
                                          if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $UnionFilePath ) === false || 
                                                $this->Cache->get_data( $UnionFilePath ) === false )
                                          {
                                                $Handle = fopen( dirname( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.css" , "wb" );
                                          
                                                foreach( $v1 as $k2 => $v2 )
                                                {
                                                      $Content = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$v2" );
                                                      fwrite( $Handle , $Content );
                                                      fwrite( $Handle , "\r\n" );
                                                }
                                                
                                                fclose( $Handle );
                                                
                                                $RetFiles [] = array( 
                                                      'path' => _get_package_relative_path( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.css"
                                                );
                                          }
                                          else
                                          {
                                                $RetFiles [] = array( 
                                                      'path' => _get_package_relative_path( __FILE__ )."/tmp/$FilesHash.css"
                                                );
                                          }
                                    }
                                    elseif( count( $v1 ) == 1 )
                                    {
                                          $RetFiles [] = array( 'path' => str_replace( './' , '{http_host}/' , "$k1/".$v1[ 0 ] ) );
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $FilesHash = '';
                                          foreach( $v1 as $k2 => $v2 )
                                          {
                                                $FilesHash .= $v2;
                                          }
                                          $FilesHash = md5( $FilesHash );
                                    
                                          $UnionFilePath = "$k1/$FilesHash.css";
                                    
                                          if( $this->CachedMultyFS->file_exists( $UnionFilePath ) === false || 
                                                $this->Cache->get_data( $UnionFilePath ) === false )
                                          {
                                                $Handle = fopen( $UnionFilePath , "wb" );
                                          
                                                foreach( $v1 as $k2 => $v2 )
                                                {
                                                      $Content = $this->CachedMultyFS->file_get_contents( "$k1/$v2" );
                                                      fwrite( $Handle , $Content );
                                                      fwrite( $Handle , "\r\n" );
                                                }
                                                
                                                fclose( $Handle );
                                          }

                                          $RetFiles [] = array( 'path' => str_replace( './' , '{http_host}/' , $UnionFilePath ) );
                                    }
                              }
                              
                              return( $RetFiles );
                        }
                        else
                        {
                              return( $Files );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

load_settings_for_package ( &$  Package,
&$  Template 
)

Function loads package's settings.

Parameters:
$Package - Package.
$Template - Template.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 873 of file page_composer_utilities.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $PackageName = $Package[ 'package' ];
                        $PackageVersion = $Package[ 'package_version' ];
                        $PlaceHolder = $Package[ 'placeholder' ];

                        $Package[ 'settings' ] = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
                        $PackageSettings = $this->get_settings_for_package( 
                              $PackageName , $PackageVersion
                        );
                        $Package[ 'settings' ]->load_settings( $PackageSettings );
                        $Package[ 'settings' ]->append_settings( $Package[ 'options' ] );

                        $PlaceHolderParameters = $Template->get_placeholder_parameters( $Package[ 'placeholder' ] );
                        
                        if( $PlaceHolderParameters !== false )
                        {
                              $Package[ 'settings' ]->append_settings( $PlaceHolderParameters );
                        }
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )

                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );

output_scripts ( $  Str  ) 

Function outputs scripts.

Parameters:
$Str - Page content.
Returns:
Page with scripts.
Exceptions:
Exception An exception of this type is thrown.
Author:
Dodonov A.A.

Definition at line 519 of file page_composer_utilities.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( is_array( $this->IncludedScripts ) && count( $this->IncludedScripts ) )
                        {
                              $this->IncludedScripts = $this->join_scripts( $this->IncludedScripts );
                              $Start = '<script src="';
                              $End = '"></script>';
                              
                              $HeaderContent = $Start.implode_ex( $End.$Start , $this->IncludedScripts , 'path' ).$End;
                              
                              if( strpos( $Str , '{header}' ) !== false )
                              {
                                    $Str = str_replace( '{header}' , $HeaderContent.'{header}' , $Str );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Str = str_replace( '</header>' , $HeaderContent.'</header>' , $Str );
                              }
                        }
                        
                        $this->IncludedScripts = array();
                        
                        return( $Str );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

Author:

Definition at line 465 of file page_composer_utilities.php.

            {
                  try
                  {
                        if( is_array( $this->IncludedStylesheets ) && count( $this->IncludedStylesheets ) )
                        {
                              $this->IncludedStylesheets = $this->join_stylesheets( $this->IncludedStylesheets , 'css' );
                              $Start = '<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="';
                              $End = '"/>';
                              
                              $HeaderContent = $Start.implode_ex( $End.$Start , $this->IncludedStylesheets , 'path' ).$End;
                              
                              if( strpos( $Str , '{header}' ) !== false )
                              {
                                    $Str = str_replace( '{header}' , $HeaderContent.'{header}' , $Str );
                              }
                              else
                              {
                                    $Str = str_replace( '</header>' , $HeaderContent.'</header>' , $Str );
                              }
                        }
                        
                        $this->IncludedStylesheets = array();
                        
                        return( $Str );
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->Trace->start_group( "controllers" );
                        
                        foreach( $Packages as $i => $p )
                        {
                              if( $p[ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'controller' , false ) )
                              {
                                    if( method_exists( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , 'controller' ) )
                                    {
                                          $p[ 'fetched_package' ]->controller( $p[ 'settings' ] );
                                    }
                                    else
                                    {
                                          $this->throw_method_was_not_found_exception( $p , 'controller' );
                                    }
                              }
                        }
                        
                        $this->Trace->end_group();
                  }

            {
                  try
                  {
                        $this->Trace->start_group( "views" );
                        
                        foreach( $Packages as $i => $p )
                        {
                              if( $p[ 'placeholder' ] != '' )
                              {                                         
                                    if( $p[ 'settings' ]->get_setting( 'view' , false ) )
                                    {
                                          if( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] !== false && method_exists( $p[ 'fetched_package' ] , 'view' ) )
                                          {
                                                $ControlView = $p[ 'fetched_package' ]->view( $p[ 'settings' ] );
                                                
                                                $ControlView = $this->PageMarkup->wrap_control_view( 
                                                      $p[ 'settings' ] , $ControlView
                                                );
                                                
                                                $Template->parse( $p[ 'placeholder' ] , $ControlView );
                                          }
                                          else
                                          {
                                                $this->throw_method_was_not_found_exception( $p , 'view' );
                                          }
                                    }
                              }
                        }
                        
                        $this->Trace->end_group();
                  }
                  catch( Exception $e )
                  {
                        $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
                  }
            }
